name: Cthulhu's Crazy Columns
description:
Cthulhu's Crazy Columns

Cthulhu's Crazy Columns is a casual arcade game in which you must help Cthulhu release his creatures that have been imprisoned in gems! Match 3 or more to combine their strength allowing them to break free. Beware the dragon eggs as they can only be destroyed by his bomb minions:

* 50 Levels over 5 themes!

* Awesome soundtrack

* Great hand drawn art!

*Who can resist Cthulhu! 

Game will continue to be worked on adding more levels and themes.

WARNING: I cannot be held responsible if you become addicted to gameplay and miss school, work, weddings, funerals, etc.
